column1: Description: Proportion of people in each country that are part of the poorest 20% of people worldwide
Source: Development Initiatives calculations based on World Bank povcalnet
On the 'Data-wide-value' sheet, we have provided the indicator in a wide format. The values you see listed there are from the 'value' column.
The following is data downloaded from Development Initiative's Datahub: http://devinit.org/data
It is provided on an as-is basis under an open-use license.
